characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: This weapon automatically hits its target

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this weapon.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If a unit is affected by this saga, they automatically pass Morale tests. In addition, if they are a CHARACTER, increase the range of any aura abilities they have by 3" (e.g. the Great Wolf and Jarl of Fenris), excluding Explodes, Healing Balms, Battlesmith, abilities of Relics of the Fang and effects of psychic powers. Deed of Legend: Slay the enemy Warlord with your Warlord.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If your army is Battle-forged, you receive 1 additional Command Point if it includes Bjorn the Fell-handed.

profile.name: Last of the Company of Russ

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for friendly SPACE WOLVES units that are within 6" of the model.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Roll a D6 each time Bjorn the Fell-handed loses a wound; on a roll of 5+ that wound is not lost.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Once per game, instead of shooting any weapons in the Shooting phase, the vehicle can use its Smoke Launchers; until your next Shooting phase your opponent must subtract 1 from all hit rolls for ranged weapons that target this vehicle.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing the model from the battlefield, on a 6 it explodes, and each unit within 3" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

selection.name: Njal Stormcaller in Runic Terminator Armour

characteristic.name: Details
characteristic.value: Living Lightning has a warp charge value of 6. If manifested, the closest visible enemy unit within 18" of the psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds. If that unit is destroyed as a result, the closest enemy unit within 18" of the last model from that unit to be removed suffers D3 mortal wounds, and so on until a unit is not destroyed or there is no enemy unit within 18" of the last model in the destroyed unit

characteristic.name: Details
characteristic.value: Tempestâ€™s Wrath has a warp charge value of 6. If manifested, select a visible enemy unit within 24" of the psyker. Until the start of your next Psychic phase, your opponent must subtract 1 from any hit rolls they make for that unit.

characteristic.name: Details
characteristic.value: Storm Caller has a warp charge value of 8. If manifested, until the start of your next Psychic phase, the psyker and any friendly SPACE WOLVESunits within 6" of him gain the benefit of being in cover.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can add 1 to any Deny the Witch tests you make for a model equipped with a psychic hood against an enemy PSYKER within 12".

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: The model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: During deployment, you can set up the model in a teleportarium chamber instead of placing him on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases he can use a teleport strike to arrive on the battlefield - set him up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: You can re-roll one failed Deny the Witch test for Njal Stormcaller in each of your opponent's Psychic phases.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can add 1 to any Psychic tests you make for Njal Stormcaller.

profile.name: Njal Stormcaller in Runic Terminator Armour

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: At the end of your Movement phase a Wolf Priest can attempt to heal a single model. To do so, select a SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY, BIKER or Cavalry unit within 3" of him. If that unit contains a wounded model, it is healed and immediately regains up to D3 lost wounds. A unit can only be the target of Healing Balms once each turn.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed hit rolls in the Fight phase for friendly SPACE WOLVES units within 6" of this model. If the model kills an enemy CHARACTER or MONSTER, then for the rest of the battle, you can add 1 to any wound rolls you make in the Fight phase for any friendly SPACE WOLVES units within 6" of him.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: All friendly SPACE WOLVES units within 9" of Ulrik the Slayer can use his Leadership instead of their own.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: Each time the bearer fights, it can make 1 additional attack with this weapon.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain after all of this weapon's shots have been resolved.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain after all of this weapon's shots have been resolved.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: For the purposes of determining what models a vehicle can transport, Wolf Guard Pack Leaders in Terminator Armour have the TERMINATOR keyword

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: For the purposes of determining what models a vehicle can transport, Wolf Guard Pack Leaders in Terminator Armour have the TERMINATOR keyword

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: If a model suffers any unsaved wounds from this weapon but is not slain, roll a D6; on a 6, the target suffers a mortal wound.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: If a model suffers any unsaved wounds from this weapon but is not slain, roll a D6; on a 6, the target suffers a mortal wound.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing it from the battlefield and before any embarked models disembark. On a 6 it crashes in a fiery explosion and each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Before this model moves in your Movement phase, you can declare it will hover. Its Move characteristic becomes 20" until the end of the phase, and it loses the Airborne, Hard to Hit and Supersonic abilities until the beginning of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model can move and fire Heavy weapons without suffering the penalty to its hit rolls.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model cannot charge, can only be charged by units that can FLY and can only attack or be attacked in the Fight phase by units that can FLY.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Your opponent must subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this model in the shooting phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Each time this model moves, first pivot it on the spot up to 90 degrees (this does not contribute to how far the model moves), and then move the model straight forwards. Note that it cannot pivot again after the initial pivot. When this model Advances, increase its Move characteristic by 20" until the end of the phase - do not roll a dice.

characteristic.name: Capacity
characteristic.value: This model can transport 6 SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY models. Each TERMINATOR, JUMP PACK or WULFEN model takes the space of two other models. It may not transport PRIMARIS models.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: After a model on this mount makes its close combat attacks, you can attack with its mount. Make 3 additional attacks, using this weapon profile.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this weapon. A model armed with two wolf claws can make 1 additional attack with this weapon.

characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this weapon. A model armed with two wolf claws can make 1 additional attack with this weapon.

characteristic.value: A model with a storm shield has a 3+ invulnerable save.

characteristic.value: When attacking with this weapon, you must subtract 1 from the hit roll.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: After this model has been set up on the battlefield it cannot move for any reason, and no units can embark upon it.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: During Deployment, you can set this model, along with any units embarked within it, in orbit instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases this model can perform a drop pod assault. - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more that 9" away from any enemy models. Any models embarked inside must immediately disembark, but they must be set up more than 9" away from any enemy model. Any models that cannot be set up because there is not enough room are slain.

characteristic.name: Capacity
characteristic.value: This model can transport 10 SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK, TERMINATOR, PRIMARIS, or WULFEN models.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: Each time the bearer fights, it can make 1 additional attack with this weapon.

characteristic.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain after all of this weapon's shots have been resolved.

characteristic.value: At the start of each of your Shooting phases, pick one enemy unit on the battlefield. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for any models from this unit that target the enemy unit you picked that phase.
